Products.name: Bulova
Products.description: The Bulova, American Clipper series features a stainless steel 42mm case, with a fixed bezel, a black (skeletal window) dial and a scratch resistant mineral crystal

Products.name: Zeno
Products.description: The ZenoThe Watch features a stainless steel 48mm case, with a black uni-directional rotating bezel, a black dial and a scratch resistant sapphire crystal
